name: NES Collect
description:
Controls - Z, X are A and B, arrow keys to move

Your NES collection has been scattered to the four corners of the earth. Okay, more like 3 screens. Can you find all 4 NES paks? Each game collected shares a memory I have about the game.

Made in GB Studio!

Credits:
Graphics by Peter Milkow, Chris Maltby, Chasersgaming, yoanqwp and myself.

Music is "In the Town" by krümel (crumb)#0723
